show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Election Fraud and Presidential Politics
content: Hosts Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips in discussion with Green Party Presidential Candidate Dr. Jill Stein on third parties and American politics; bestselling author and journalist Greg Palast is in the SF Bay Area next week debuting his new book Billionaires and Ballot Bandits:  How to Steal an Election in 9 Easy Steps;  at the bottom of the hour it’s Project Censored’s Validated Independent News with student intern Kimberly Soeiro; and the program concludes with political cartoonist and author Khalil Bendib.
